# Steps to reproduce

```powershell
function test {
[CmdletBinding()]
param()
test1
}
function test1 {
[CmdletBinding()]
param()
test2 "xxxx"
}
function test2 {
[CmdletBinding()]
param($a)
irm $a
}
test
```

# Expected behavior
It should show the tree
```none
test:line xx
└── test1:line 
    └── test2:line xx
Invoke-RestMethod:
Line |
   4 |  irm $a
     |  ~~~~~~
     | Name or service not known
```

# Actual behavior

```none

```

title: Error prompts are not useful in nested functions.
